skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Places a [Shield] buff on all allies for 3 turns and a [Counterattack] buff on all allies for 2 turns. The value of [Shield] and the damage inflicted are proportional to this Champion's DEF.

skills.desc: This Champion's Turn Meter will be increased by 10% each time an enemy Champion places a buff. Enemy Champions will have their Turn Meters decreased by 10% for each buff they receive.
skills.name: Jealousy [Passive]
